brand_names: Dr.G A CLEAR ACNE SPOT TREATMENT SERUM
warnings: Warnings For external use only. When using this product Skin irritation and dryness is more likely to occur if you use another topical acne medication at the same time. If irritation occurs, only use one topical acne medication at a time . Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, flush thoroughly with water.
dosage_administration: Directions Clean the skin thoroughly before applying this product. Cover the entire affected area with a thin layer one to three times daily. Because excessive drying of the skin may occur, start with one application daily, then gradually increase to two or three times daily if needed or as directed by a doctor. If bothersome dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day.
indications: Use For the treatment of acne.
